original_text: and Joseph reduced the people to servitude, from one end of Egypt to the other.
korean_text: 요셉이 애굽 땅 이 끝에서 저 끝까지의 백성을 성읍들에 옮겼으나

sentences.original_text: and Joseph reduced the people to servitude
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 요셉은 백성들을 종이 되게 하였고

sentences.original_text: from one end of Egypt to the other
